name: THE SCREW OF SISYPHUS
description:
Let this be presented to you...

Carpentry 101: A study on the futility of human existence, the conundrum of living a life with no ultimate purpose or meaning or THE SCREW OF SISYPHUS

In his 1942 philosophical essay The Myth Of Sisyphus, philosopher Albert Camus shares his philosophy of the absurd. How strange it is, he muses, that humanity searches so strongly for a reason to live, when the universe seems to say impassively that we exist naught but to exist. 

In front of you is a screw in a board. Click it to drive it deeper into the wood, and to set your mind a gallop on the reason for why we're here.

Made for the GDS Winter Game Jam 2022, with the theme of 'Existential'.
